items.name: utils
items.title: Utilities
items.description: Utility function for merging Tailwind CSS classes with clsx and tailwind-merge.

items.name: springs
items.title: Spring Animations
items.description: Spring animation token presets for Framer Motion (fast, moderate, slow).

items.name: font-weight
items.title: Font Weight Tokens
items.description: Variable font weight tokens for Inter (normal, medium, semibold, bold) using font-variation-settings.

items.name: shape-context
items.title: Shape Context
items.description: React context provider for runtime shape variant switching (pill or rounded). Controls border-radius across all Fluid Functionalism components.

items.name: use-proximity-hover
items.title: useProximityHover
items.description: React hook for proximity-based hover detection. Tracks the closest item to the mouse cursor within a container, enabling smooth animated background indicators.

items.name: button
items.title: Button
items.description: Animated button with variants (primary, secondary, tertiary, ghost), icon support, loading spinner, and fluid font-weight transitions on hover.

items.name: dropdown
items.title: Dropdown
items.description: Dropdown menu with proximity-based hover tracking, animated selection indicator, and animated focus ring. Includes MenuItem sub-component.

items.name: checkbox-group
items.title: Checkbox Group
items.description: Animated checkbox group with proximity hover, contiguous selection merging, and spring-animated check marks. Built on Radix UI Checkbox.

items.name: radio-group
items.title: Radio Group
items.description: Animated radio group with proximity hover, spring-animated selection dot, and optional Radix UI integration. Supports both controlled index and value-based APIs.

items.name: dialog
items.title: Dialog
items.description: Animated modal dialog with spring-based scale and opacity transitions. Built on Radix UI Dialog with overlay, header, footer, title, and description sub-components.

items.name: input-group
items.title: Input Group
items.description: Grouped input fields with proximity-based highlighting, animated label transitions, optional icons, and error states.

items.name: subtle-tab
items.title: Subtle Tab
items.description: Horizontal tab navigation with proximity hover, animated pill selection indicator, and fluid font-weight transitions. Supports icons and keyboard navigation.

items.name: switch
items.title: Switch
items.description: Animated toggle switch with spring-based thumb animation and fluid font-weight label transitions. Built on Radix UI Switch.

items.name: table
items.title: Table
items.description: Animated table with proximity-based row hover highlighting and fluid border transitions. Includes TableHeader, TableBody, TableRow, TableHead, and TableCell sub-components.

items.name: thinking-indicator
items.title: Thinking Indicator
items.description: Animated loading indicator with morphing SVG path (circle to infinity loop) and shimmer text rotation. Cycles through customizable status words.
